4.9. umbra.components.addons.traceUi.views¶

views.py

Platform:
Windows, Linux, Mac Os X.
Description:
This module defines the umbra.components.factory.traceUi.traceUi.TraceUi Component Interface class View.

Others:

4.9.1. Module Attributes¶

umbra.components.addons.traceUi.views.LOGGER¶

4.9.2. Classes¶

class umbra.components.addons.traceUi.views.Modules_QTreeView(parent, model=None, readOnly=False, message=None)[source]¶

Bases: umbra.ui.views.Abstract_QTreeView

This class is used to display modules.

Parameters:
  • parent – Object parent. ( QObject )
  • model – Model. ( QObject )
  • readOnly – View is read only. ( Boolean )
  • message – View default message when Model is empty. ( String )

This method is the property for self.__treeViewIndentation attribute.
